mapper.select: SELECT * FROM region ORDER BY region_number OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY
SELECT region_number, title, description, create_time, update_time, image_url FROM region WHERE region_number = #{regionNumber, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO region (region_number, title, description, create_time, image_url) VALUES (region_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{description}, SYSDATE, #{imageUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE region SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, update_time = SYSDATE, image_url = #{imageUrl} WHERE region_number = #{regionNumber}
